about: A reimplementation of the default CKAN dataset schema

dataset_fields.label: Description
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: eg. Some useful notes about the data

dataset_fields.label: License
dataset_fields.help_text: License definitions and additional information can be found at http://opendefinition.org/

dataset_fields.label: Copyright
dataset_fields.help_text: Select 'yes', 'no' or 'unclear copyright' about the copyright of the dataset. If copyright of any type is present, describe further in Access and User Constraints.

dataset_fields.label: Access and Use Constraints
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: A few sentences describing legal considerations for people who access the website and/or use its contents.

dataset_fields.label: Contact
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: Contact information for the individual or organization that is responsible for or most knowledgeable about the dataset. This could be the author of a report, the contact information for the relevant department of an organization that produced a report, or the data analyst, mapper or researcher that produced a dataset or report.

dataset_fields.label: Language
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: Language(s) of the dataset, including resources within dataset.

dataset_fields.label: Date created
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: Date the dataset was first Published by its creator.

dataset_fields.label: Date uploaded
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: Date a new version or update of the dataset was uploaded.

dataset_fields.label: Date modified
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: Date a new version or update of the dataset was uploaded.

dataset_fields.label: Temporal Range.
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: The period of time for which the dataset is relevant (i.e. 2011-01-01:2011-12-31).

dataset_fields.label: Geographic area (Spatial Range)
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: The geographic area that the dataset is relevant to (i.e. Cambodia, Laos).

dataset_fields.label: Accuracy
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: Details on the level of accuracy of the dataset and any existing issues.

dataset_fields.label: Logical Consistency
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: Issues with logical consistency in the dataset and the steps, if any, being taken to validate its content.

dataset_fields.label: Completeness
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: Brief description of the level of completeness of the dataset's contents and the steps, if any, being taken to make the dataset more complete.

dataset_fields.label: Process(es)
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: The steps taken to acquire, aggregate, or transform any of the resources in the dataset.

dataset_fields.label: Source(s)
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: Ordered citations for all information sources that went into producing the dataset.

dataset_fields.label: Metadata Reference Information
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: Information about how up-to-date the metadata is and who is responsible for maintaining it.

dataset_fields.label: Attributes
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: Details about the information content of the dataset.

resource_fields.label: Description
resource_fields.form_placeholder: Some useful notes about the data
